name: 歌劇指導（一）
goals: Learn the techniques and methods of opera rehearsal.
Participate in the rehearsal and performance of opera productions.
Gain experience in rehearsals with professional orchestras.
Understand and participate in the operations of the arts administration team.
Through the multi-faceted technical guidance of large-scale opera productions, students can develop all-round abilities in the operation of professional orchestras.
syllabus:
**授課方式：16+2週**

教學內容：

由經典歌劇劇目中，依照學生能力分組學習重唱曲目，著重角色分析、聲音詮釋、音樂內涵，並配合戲劇肢體訓練及其他舞台藝術知識學習。
